statements: SELECT * FROM ArtworkRecords;
SELECT artwork_title, artist_name FROM ArtworkRecords WHERE artwork_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ArtworkRecords WHERE artist_name LIKE 'Van Gogh%';
SELECT artwork_title, restoration_description FROM ArtworkRecords ORDER BY restoration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ArtworkRecords WHERE restoration_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM ArtworkRecords WHERE artist_name = 'Leonardo da Vinci';
SELECT artwork_title, restoration_date FROM ArtworkRecords WHERE restoration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT artwork_title, artist_name FROM ArtworkRecords WHERE restoration_description LIKE '%cracks%';
SELECT * FROM ArtworkRecords ORDER BY restoration_date DESC;
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(*) AS total_artworks FROM ArtworkRecords GROUP BY artist_name HAVING total_artworks > 1;
SELECT * FROM Artworks;
SELECT title, artist FROM Artworks ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT * FROM Artworks WHERE artist = 'Picasso';
SELECT title, creation_date FROM Artworks WHERE creation_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT description, restoration_date, conservator FROM Restoration_Log ORDER BY restoration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Artworks WHERE artist = 'Picasso' ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT id, title, creation_date FROM Artworks WHERE artist LIKE '%Van Gogh%' ORDER BY creation_date ASC;
SELECT artist, COUNT(title) as num_artworks FROM Artworks GROUP BY artist HAVING num_artworks > 3;
SELECT * FROM Restoration_Log INNER JOIN Artworks ON Restoration_Log.artwork_id = Artworks.id WHERE restoration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT artist, MAX(creation_date) as latest_creation_date FROM Artworks GROUP BY artist ORDER BY latest_creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Artwork;
SELECT id, title, artist FROM Artwork ORDER BY year_created DESC;
SELECT AVG(year_created) AS avg_year_created FROM Artwork;
SELECT title, artist, hire_date FROM Artwork LEFT JOIN Conservator ON Artwork.id = Conservator.id;
SELECT title, hire_date, description FROM Artwork JOIN RestorationRecord ON Artwork.id = RestorationRecord.artwork_id;
SELECT title, artist, year_created FROM Artwork ORDER BY year_created DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, expertise, hire_date FROM Conservator WHERE expertise = 'Paintings';

SELECT Artwork.title, Conservator.name, RestorationRecord.date_started FROM Artwork JOIN RestorationRecord ON Artwork.id = RestorationRecord.artwork_id JOIN Conservator ON RestorationRecord.conservator_id = Conservator.id WHERE RestorationRecord.date_started >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT artist FROM Artwork;
SELECT title, YEAR(date_started) AS start_year, YEAR(date_completed) AS completion_year FROM RestorationRecord;
SELECT * FROM Artwork;
SELECT title, artist, year FROM Artwork WHERE year > 2000;
SELECT id, name, hire_date FROM Conservator ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT title, artist, creation_date FROM Artwork WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, name, specialty FROM Conservator WHERE specialty IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Artwork WHERE year > 1800;
SELECT * FROM Restoration WHERE status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT title, artist, creation_date FROM Artwork WHERE artist = 'Leonardo da Vinci' ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT artwork.title, conservator.name, preservation.method FROM Artwork JOIN Preservation ON artwork.id = preservation.artwork_id JOIN Conservator ON preservation.conservator_id = conservator.id;
SELECT * FROM Restoration WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Artwork;
SELECT artwork_id, artist_name FROM Artwork ORDER BY artwork_id DESC;
SELECT artist_name, art_medium FROM Artwork WHERE artwork_id = 3;
SELECT conservator_name, expertise_area FROM Conservator WHERE expertise_area LIKE '%painting%';
SELECT * FROM RestorationWork WHERE date_completed >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_completed ASC;
SELECT * FROM Artwork ORDER BY artist_name DESC, date_created ASC;
SELECT artwork_id, artist_name, art_medium FROM Artwork WHERE artist_name LIKE 'J%' OR artist_name LIKE 'M%';
SELECT artwork_id, artist_name, date_created FROM Artwork WHERE date_created BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT a.artist_name, r.work_description, c.conservator_name FROM Artwork a JOIN RestorationWork r ON a.artwork_id = r.artwork_id JOIN Conservator c ON r.conservator_id = c.conservator_id WHERE r.date_completed >= '2021-06-01';
SELECT DISTINCT a.artist_name, p.work_description FROM Artwork a INNER JOIN PreservationWork p ON a.artwork_id = p.artwork_id WHERE p.date_started < '2022-01-01';
